A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
1/16th of Star... I'm guessing that those who have given half a star wish they thought to give what I did... The critics were pressured into giving fake positive reviews.
Nothing is good about this film. 
Nothing. 
Bad story\, stupid character decisions\, waste of mark Hamill\, idiotic comedy attempts\, no suspense. Just a really bad mess that I wanted to walk out of. 
I even paid to have those moving seats that just repeatedly kicked me in the back. A reminder of how stupid I was to pay for my wife & I to see this mess. 
Don't believe a single positive review. When have you seen a super high reviewer rating contrasted by a abysmal real people rating.
